analyzed: ▁citta saṃsaṭṭh asamuṭṭhān a saha bhū du ka

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
